cmp: 丙 (the third of the ten heavenly stems/the third position/third/number three)
mng: handle or shaft (of an axe etc), (of a flower, leaf or fruit) stem, sth that affords an advantage to an opponent, classifier for knives or blades

exm.mng: handle, (fig.) information that can be used against sb
a matter for ridicule, an object of ridicule, laughingstock
a pretext for gossip, a matter for derision
to hand someone the swordhilt (idiom), to give someone a hold on oneself
